name: Khan 'Sadh' Mostafa
highlights: Software Engineer at Teledata Communication, Inc.
MS in CS from Stony Brook / B.Sc. (Engineering) from KUET

experience.about: TCI builds and provides SaaS for financial institutions. It's primary product is Decision Lender - a “Loan Origination Solution” for Credit Unions and banks.

info.description: Developing backend business logic and frontend user interface along with service integrations for new version of TCI’s Loan Origination Solution - Decision Lender 4x
Developed and maintained Decisions Lender v3.5 for existing and new clients
Worked for CA Technologies at CEWIT as on campus internship during MS

experience.about: SRBD is one of the 33 global Research & Development centers and 6 Design centers of Samsung Electronics. It is considered as first R&D settlement of a multinational corporation in Bangladesh. Its operation started in June, 2010. At that time, Sadh joined the inaugural team of ten.

info.description: Designed a host – target interaction protocol and developed control module with GUI for FPGA and post-silicon SoC (System on Chip) verification platform
Developed modules of a camera SoC verification tool based on μC/OS-II
As part of DSP project ported μC/OS-II for custom BSP, ported Web-P for Samsung’s Reconfigurable Processor, developed image code
Participated in development of custom system software for feature phones
Developed smart phone apps for Samsung’s bada platform

education.about: The State University of New York at Stony Brook (also referred to as Stony Brook University, SUNY Stony Brook, SBU) is a public sea-grant and space-grant research university located in Stony Brook, New York in the United States. It is part of the State University of New York (SUNY) system.

info.description: Designed tool for opinion mining which leverages entity-keyword bi-graph built from analyzing social network feed
Implemented a procedural watercolor engine to recreate real-time watercolor effects
Added XML parser for BOSS (brain model simulation tool) INIT module to feed brain model parameters as XML input

education.about: KUET, a public university in Bangladesh, emphasizes on engineering and technology. It has a comprehensive Computer Science and Engineering program.

description: – An approach to emerge Semantic Web”:
Developed a framework (RS2-fx) to convert current html web documents into
by extracting underlying semantics backed by support of an existing ontology

info.description: Developed an automated traffic jam recognition and alert tool, Traffic Window, aided with image processing

description: Developed a Smart home technology, which includes a centrally controlled local system of devices and sensors that actuates smartly upon perceptions. The control unit interfaces with local GUI as well as internet and cellular networks
